title: Premier Insurance Offering Overview
summary: This slide introduces the Premier insurance plans, including Group Hospital Fixed Indemnity and Group Accident Insurance. The coverage is underwritten by United States Fire Insurance Company and is offered exclusively to NCE Members.

title: Group Hospital Fixed Indemnity and Group Accident Insurance Benefits
summary: This slide provides detailed information on the daily hospital confinement and emergency room visit benefits offered under various insurance plans, ranging from 100 Plan to 1000+ Plan. It includes specific benefit amounts for services such as daily hospital admission, intensive care, surgery, and outpatient services. Additionally, it outlines the benefits for various diagnostic services and anesthesia. The slide also details accidental death benefits and hospital admission benefits, with a list of available states for the plan.

title: Group Hospital Fixed Indemnity Description of Benefits
summary: This slide details the specific provisions and benefits available under a Group Hospital Fixed Indemnity plan. It covers the conditions under which the Hospital Admission Benefit is payable, including requirements for medical necessity and timing of hospital stays. It also outlines benefits for intensive care, coronary care, and daily inpatient surgery, along with daily inpatient surgery anesthesia benefits. Additionally, the slide explains the definition of a covered accident for emergency room visits and specifies exclusions related to sickness and injury.

title: Group Hospital Fixed Indemnity Description of Benefits
summary: This slide outlines various benefits under the Group Hospital Fixed Indemnity plan. It includes coverage for Day Outpatient Surgery, Inpatient Diagnostic Radiology and Laboratory Tests, and Day Outpatient Laboratory Tests. Each section specifies the conditions under which the benefits apply, such as procedures being performed in a hospital or surgical center, and certain exclusions like services performed for diagnostic purposes only.

title: Group Accident Benefits Description
summary: The slide details the hospital confinement benefits and daily intensive care for group accident policies. It specifies conditions for receiving benefits, such as the necessity of medical treatment and confinement within a hospital. Benefits begin on the first day of confinement and continue until discharge, with specific daily payments outlined. There are sections for both general hospital confinement and intensive care unit benefits, each with distinct criteria and payment structures.

title: Group Accident Description of Benefits
summary: This slide outlines the benefits associated with a group accident insurance plan, including daily inpatient surgery, outpatient surgery, inpatient radiology, and laboratory tests. Each section details the conditions under which benefits are paid, such as treatment by a physician, necessity due to an accident, and appropriate licensing of facilities.

title: Group Hospital Fixed Indemnity Benefit Exclusions
summary: This slide outlines the exclusions of the Group Hospital Fixed Indemnity insurance plan. It specifies situations where coverage is not provided, such as injuries from self-inflicted harm, military service, illegal activities, drug or alcohol intoxication, and various medical conditions and treatments. It also excludes coverage for experimental procedures, cosmetic surgeries, and services provided by certain healthcare professionals.

title: Group Hospital Fixed Indemnity Benefit Exclusions
summary: The slide lists various exclusions for group hospital fixed indemnity benefits, including treatments not covered such as blood disorders, surgeries, and experimental procedures. It also mentions pre-existing condition limitations and specifies that insurance is limited and not comprehensive.

title: Group Accident Benefit Exclusions
summary: This slide outlines the exclusions for group accident benefits. It lists specific scenarios where coverage is not provided, including injuries from war, self-inflicted harm, participation in riots, and acts under the influence of alcohol or drugs. It also excludes coverage for injuries during illegal activities, felonies, and participation in hazardous sports without proper safety precautions. Additionally, injuries covered under other specific insurances like Workers’ Compensation are excluded.

title: Group Accident Benefit Exclusions Continued
summary: The slide lists specific exclusions for group accident benefits, detailing circumstances under which benefits are not payable. These include injuries related to war, service in armed forces, travel in non-commercial vehicles, engaging in certain hazardous activities, and pre-existing medical conditions. Additional exclusions cover injuries from drug or alcohol use, or any act of war.

title: Termination of Insurance Policies
summary: This slide outlines the terms for policy termination, including automatic termination conditions based on premium payment, policyholder actions, and changes in eligibility. It details the procedure for both policyholder and company-initiated terminations and specifies the conditions for the insured person’s termination. Additionally, it covers dependent’s coverage termination and provides contact information for inquiries. Premium refund rules are also explained.

title: NCE Association Membership Overview
summary: This slide provides an overview of the NCE Association Membership, highlighting its purpose, benefits, and insurance options. It explains NCE's role in supporting small to medium-sized businesses with valuable services. Details include the purchase of ID cards for membership, Premier Plan insured benefits, and eligibility requirements for group hospital indemnity and accident insurance plans.

title: NCE Association Membership Benefits Overview
summary: The slide outlines the benefits of NCE Association Membership, highlighting that there are no waiting periods or pre-existing condition limitations. It includes services such as medical discounts, dental care, pharmacy discounts, and more. The GapAfford Plus program offers additional discounts on medical services and various other products. Additionally, members have access to First Health Network Provider Discounts, which offer savings when using network providers.

title: NCE Association Membership Benefits - GapAfford Plus
summary: This slide details the benefits available to members through the GapAfford Plus program, including prescription discounts, access to telemedicine, pet care savings, dental and vision care, chiropractic care, and more. It also highlights services like lab savings, MRI and CT savings, and medical billing negotiation assistance.
